resources.string: Please place your finger on your phone\'s fingerprint Scanner
Your fingerprint has been verified. You may use your fingerprint for subsequent logins
To Simplify your login, you may wish to setup Enhanced Login now. please choose from the following options:
Click here to set up Picture Unlock
Click here to set up Fingerprint Unlock
By pressing I agree, I agree to the Terms and Conditions for usage of this mobile application.
